item.title: The greatest crime in human history
item.author: Eduardo Conesa-Pietscheck,
item.description: No. If you guessed by reading the title that I was going to say warfare, you are wrong. Poverty? We built that ourselves. Famine? Yet another consequence of capitalism. The Holocaust? Although a stigma that will forever stain the history of mankind, it did not sustain itself for relatively long. â€¦
